jobs.title: Looking for a freelance frontend developer
jobs.overview: Dividstar was established in 1932 by Matthew Cohens in Virginia, United States. Dividstar has been the leader application for personal finance over the past 10 decades and aim to continue holding that position. As times continue to evolve, we do too.
requirements: Understanding of Next.js, React, and Angular.
Knowledge of REACT tools including React.js, Webpack, Enzyme, Redux, and Flux.
